column4: Hey, when i tried to play an mp3 in rythmbox, is said that no plugin is installed to handel an mp3 file... what do i need to install?
what do i have to do?
nothing happene dhwen i did that
do the last few lines mention wireless, intel, anything?
what's listed in the left hand column?
ok, so that means your driver isn't loaded
is there a Network or Ethernet item in that list?
in the ubuntu forum some guy said his worked when he set it up as eth0.. how do you do that to a wireless card??
you don't really do that directly, and it's unrelated to the driver not connecting to an interface
provide useful information to help people solve the problem, like the answers you've given me
if i knew the precise problem, you'd have working wifi by now
